resources.string:
Blitz Boba brings your favorite boba drinks on wheels! We\'ve simplified our menu where you understand your drink - just with a modern twist! \n\n
We\'re more than just a truck! Blitz Boba was born from the idea of bringing communities together. Come hang out with us! We\'re all about good vibes with good people.
Click on our upcoming events and see where you can find us rolling thru the streets of Las Vegas!
You can also order on the app ahead of time!
